description: Audit and correct all pages on the AI Toolkit website to ensure accurate, up-to-date information that matches the actual toolkit behavior.

userStories.title: Fix Getting Started Prerequisites
userStories.description: As a new user setting up the AI Toolkit, I want accurate prerequisite information so that I can successfully install and use the toolkit
acceptanceCriteria: Prerequisites section reflects actual requirements: OpenCode CLI, Git, and GitHub Account with Copilot Premium (recommended)
Remove Node.js from prerequisites (not required for toolkit usage)
Each prerequisite explains why it's needed
GitHub Copilot Premium is mentioned as the recommended path for best models
Alternative LLM providers (Zen, API keys) are mentioned
Typecheck passes
Lint passes
Works in both light and dark mode
